name: Auto Record Generation
description: Module that allows for a new record to be generated in another project (or the same project) on a flagging field being saved. Allows for data fields to be transferred to the new record as well.

project-settings.name: Project in Which to Generate New Record
Name for New Record (Accepts standard REDCap piping. Leave blank to use next auto ID)
Overwrite data in destination project record every time data is saved in this project.
Data Field to Pipe to New Record (Field names must match, leave blank to transfer every data field)
